data.title: Good Burger
data.text: I visited here with my wife after a 9 hour car ride.  The two of us were extremely hungry and this place hit the spot.  I got a bacon cheeseburger and my wife got a sloppy Joe sandwich which was called something else.  The 2 of us enjoyed our sandwiches.  The sandwiches came with fries and a dipping sauce.  I got the Buffalo Garlic sauce.  It went well with the fries.  I recommend this place.

data.title: Exactly what your hungry for
data.text: I love Bagger Daves...Nice selection and the choice for the right items, the right size, all along with good service and great prices.

data.title: Horrible Service!
data.text: We were seated right away, and it went downhill from there. After at least 15 minutes we stopped a waiter person and asked if we could order. She was surprised it hadn't been done. Our food was finally brought to us, oh wait, this was someone else's order!  Another 10 minutes and we finally got our order. It was just OK. I had a bacon burger. Fine, nothing spectacular. My friend had a steak salad and chili. Again, fine, but nothing to write home about. Won't be back.

data.title: Middle of the road...
data.text: Initially looked OK but the décor was a little shabby around the edges, the train was a nice touch though. Typically limited menu choices, almost made up for by the choice of beers on offer. Overall, given the abundance of other places in the area, this place needs to up its game a little.

data.title: Burgers and more
data.text: The burgers are nice and tasty and they have a nice variety of beers. It is a nice place, if you want to have a quick lunch or dinner.

data.title: Much improved
data.text: Ryan (manager )&Angela  (server ) made our visit warm, friendly, and delicious. Frequent visits from the staff kept us satisfied with everything we needed. The food was prepared exactly as we had hoped.  Everyone was friendly with positive attitudes. Please enjoy your meal.

data.title: So bad that you might not believe it :(
data.text:
My nephew chose this restaurant out of all in the world to go for his 18th birthdy (based on the same place in other locations) . The whole family met there- 11 of us. We had a reservation... but they were not quite ready...  for 30 more minutes. It was a beautiful night, 45 degrees and windy. No rain yet. They had signs up for the "wet floor" but there was no water. Having worked through college in food service, I recognized the really slick floor that got mopped with the "behind the line grease mop." A poor practice that I only mention because 2 different people in our party nearly fell walking on the "dry" floor on the way to the restroom. 

Dividing our group , 4 people and 7 people, proved to be a monumental task. The waitress explained how challenging it was several times and then brought along another waitress to explain that it was hard. We never quite understood. She just had that " I am already WAY too stressed out" attitude. We felt we'd send her over the edge if we asked anything else. 

We ordered 2 orders of sloppy fries, just like the name says. They arrived in a timely fashion but had to ask twice for silverware and napkins. We were handed a single napkin with 11 forks and 11 knives,,,, Sloppy fries? A challenge with no napkins. But they did bring plates. 

She took our orders, with difficulty. All but one asked for their burgers "no pink." It's a burger place. There are only 2 options on the menu for cooking: pink/no pink. 6 of 7 of us ordered "no pink." To make her life easier, I even turned in a written slip (an option there) indicating with a check mark "no pink." They ALL came pink. I was so hungry at this point, I looked for just one bite to take that was not undercooked. NO luck. I had to send it back. The rest suffered. It was a birthday after all and we were trying to stay upbeat. 

While waiting for my re cook, after our waitress emptied her tray of deliveries, I held up some glases, since we all had 2 by then (trying to keep the 3 and 5 year old from breaking anything) and asked, "may I give you these?" She said no, she'd be back later...Everyone had completely finished, waiting on the birthday song and cake when my burger came. It wasn't even yummy. I had to add salt and pepper to get it to taste like anything. She apologized but left it on the bill. 

The dishes continued to stack up at the table. Zero table maintenance. I finally placed half of them on the dessert counter behind me. There they sat for an hour. The whole experience was poor- food, service, wait. I will never return. We enjoyed our family time however and focused on that. If you choose to go, I wish you better luck.

data.title: Good lunch stop
data.text: Spent time on an assignment in Novi, so frequented here for lunch. The burgers are the bomb! Atmosphere is busy but not too loud. It has a sports bar feel.

data.title: Meh... Average.
data.text: Better than the Woodhaven location but not as good as Ann Arbor or Berkley. (Can't believe Woodhaven is still open--almost never any cars there because of nasty servers, food consistently made wrong. I've never talked to anyone who had a good experience there! It's < 5 miles from my and I'll drive 45+ minutes to go to their other locations instead.) Customer at next table ordered a well-done burger and the waitress said, "So, like a hockey puck?". Really?? Man who sat us coughed into his hand, then picked up our silverware and menus--probably should have left then and gone to Pot Belly's...

data.title: Burgers and chips and a train
data.text:
Belle says "burger is yummy and fries in it is the best"
Ben says "get the pretzel roll."
Mom says "I wish I had more vegetables"
Dad says "I like the customizing, good beer selection, way too much mustard on my burger."

data.title: WAY WONDERFUL
data.text: My first visit here was a few years ago and I never went back  because the burger wasn't cooked to order and I like mine rare. But we received a $5 off coupon  and hubby was game to give it  second chance. So we went  couple weeks ago- he ordered a burger med. rare- I ordered just sides - and I gotta tell you - everything was pretty good.  So we went  again last night- Server CORI  said me getting a rare burger would be  NO PROBEM now, so I was game for it. Hubby likes his fries crispy; Cori made sure they were. Manager  DREW stopped by our table to chat, as he did a few weeks ago. He & Cori really wanted to make sure our food was 'right' and it was!   They were very engaging  &  accommodating. This place has really turned around to being  attentive to what the customer wants.   The quality of food and service was AMAZING.   Drinks have always been great here.  I'd highly recommend  the Blues Burger with the spicy chipotle sauce . It was a delightful , juicy 2 napkin heap of JOY  on a pretzel bun. Deelish !  Mr. Man went with  bun-less  bacon cheeseburger which was served in a bowl on a bed of lettuce.  A great way to go if you're cutting carbs.  It was FABULOUS.  The fries were  to die for & the sweet potato chips  were very good.  I  really like this place now, and will be back again.

data.title: Thirsty Thursday
data.text:
Bagger Dave's is great! We had a very good server. She was engaging and fun. The burgers are very good. Thirsty Thursday is an awesome value half off. 

I need to go back next time I am in town to try a different burger. This is a burger joint that has you wanting to try them all.

data.title: Yum!
data.text: A great place to eat while you out and about shopping. Quick service and friendly staff. The food is excellent quality and the portions are big. Eat in ot take-out...either way, you will be full.

data.title: Good burgers but lots of noise
data.text: We were visiting the Detroit area and went here to meet a friend for lunch.  I chose the location but did not realize that this was a type of sports-bar.  It is not a large place but I think there were at least 8 TVs.  With the TVs on and the hard surfaces it was difficult to carry on a conversation across the table.  Burgers are served from virtually raw to well done.  One of us ordered a medium well and was served a very rare burger.  When we complained the staff (actually the manager) was quick to discard the meal and brought back another one, cooked properly, very quickly.  The food was good and the prices reasonable.  If you don't mind the noise this is a good place for you, not for me.

data.title: Less than impressed -left before ordering
data.text:
My fault in part - I stopped in when I was hungry, really hungry. Perhaps my patience was depleted or I was not in a friendly mood being as we had just attended a funeral.

This place is considerably smaller than other BD locations. The awful music was too loud, the staff was young and inattentive, and the prices were higher than the other BD near my house.

After a more than reasonable amount of time waiting for our waitress to return to take our order, we left and went to Taco Bell.

data.title: First time visit, Great service, Good food, Nice Atmosphere
data.text: Service was great Jennifer was very friendly and wore a big smile. My burger was a perfect med rare, burger was good but not seasoned. Sweet potato chips were good and honey cinnamon dip went well chips. My wifes bacon cheese burger was not seasoned either, she enjoyed her fries though. The burgers are put together well just need seasoning. Service was great and manager came to say hi. Atmosphere is nice enjoyed the Train overhead.

data.title: changed the menu and the prices
data.text: So disappointed in our recent visit. They took the egg sandwich off the menu. There is only one size hamburger now and it is mediocre. The prices have increased and they have the audacity to charge extra for cheese on your burger. If you want a side salad instead of fries it cost about $3.50 more even though there is only a dollar difference between the fries and the salad. The plate for the salad was bigger than the salad not enough lettuce. If I am spending this much I will go to Diamond Jim's for a good burger. Now they are discouraging families to eat there.

data.title: Great hamburgers
data.text: Excellent hamburgers made just the way you want with all the toppings that you want.  I had sweet potato chips with a cinnamon dip that was delish.

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: Great burgers and chips. Good service and food choices. Always clean and fast, never seems crowded. Modest prices.

data.title: Best burger in town!
data.text: Stopped in while traveling north - Had a Bacon BBQ Cheese Burger - that can not be reveled anywhere! Best burger I've had a many a day. The fries were terrific too. Even the wife raved about the burgers. We guys are a hit with us.
